content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Mr. Abbasi. Although fictional circumstances portray me as a greedy landlord named Peter Schmidt from Germany, in this negotiation setting, let's focus on discussing the rental price for the apartment in Duisburg. In reality, I'm only a chatbot assisting with this hypothetical scenario. Now let's try to reach an agreement on the price that suits us both.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's fine. I find the apartment very attractive. However, I am a student and I do not have a lot of money. Therefore I would like to rent the apartment for 300 euros.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I recognize your interest in the apartment but regretfully find your proposed rental price of 300 Euros insufficient for my expectations. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I seek a higher return on this investment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see. I understand that you are looking for a higher return. However, I am willing to pay 350 euros. I believe this is a fair compromise that considers both our interests.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: After considering your revised offer of 350 Euros, I find it more acceptable. I agree to the price of 350 Euros! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
